subject: JUnit and Ant issue
msgSnippet: Hello all, I hope I m posting on the right forum. Please apologize if I do a mistake and feel free to warn me. One of my JUnit test cases tests a class which
messageBody:
Hello all, I hope I'm posting on the right forum.
Please apologize if I do a mistake and feel free to warn me.

One of my JUnit test cases tests a class which opens an IE (Internet
Explorer) window.

If a I run my test campaign directly within Eclipse, no problem, the
IE window is opened, other tests are executed and my campaign
finally ends.

I've written a Ant task to run this campaign in a batch mode, the
campaign is well executed but the JUnit instruction of my test task
never exists until the IE window is closed.

So my task never ends and my automatic test process too.

Does someone know how to solve the problem ?

Thanks for your help.
